posts.title: Next.js App Router Update
posts.content: The App Router represents a new foundation for the future of Next.js, but we recognize there are opportunities to make the experience better. We'd like qqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqq

posts.title: Next.js 13.4
posts.content: Since the release of Next.js 13 six months ago, we've been focused on building the foundations for the future of Next.js—App Router—in a way that can be incrementally adopted without unnecessary breaking changes.Today, with the release of 13.4, you can now start adopting the App Router for production.

posts.title: useRouter()を使おうとしたらエラー
posts.content:
vscodeで自動インポートするとimport { useRouter } from "next/router";となり

next/routerからインポートされます。それだと**Error: NextRouter was not mounted. https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/next-router-not-mountedという**エラーが出ます。

エラーから公式ページに飛んでみると、next/navigationからインポートしてと書いてあります。
⭕️import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
